identificationModule.briefTitle: Post-market Clinical Follow-up Study of Alcon TOTAL30® Contact Lenses (Lehfilcon A)
identificationModule.officialTitle: Post-market Clinical Follow-up Study of Alcon TOTAL30® Spherical Contact Lenses (Lehfilcon A) and TOTAL30® for Astigmatism Contact Lenses (Lehfilcon A)

descriptionModule.briefSummary: The purpose of this Post-Market Clinical Follow-Up (PMCF) study is to continuously assess the visual performance and safety of TOTAL30 Sphere and TOTAL30 for Astigmatism contact lenses in a real-world setting across a broad variety of patients through routine clinical practices.
descriptionModule.detailedDescription:
The Baseline visit is defined as the first office visit where an eye care professional provided an in-person office biomicroscopy exam to the subject, before or during which a TOTAL30 sphere or toric contact lens prescription was released. Baseline visit data will be collected retrospectively (chart review).

The Year 1 visit is defined as the visit that occurs 1 year (-2/+6 months) since the Baseline visit during which period the subject is wearing test lenses of the same design in both eyes, and a contact lens examination is performed. Year 1 data will be collected either retrospectively or prospectively (eye exam).

armGroups.label: TOTAL30 Sphere
armGroups.description: Lehfilcon A spherical contact lenses worn in both eyes in a real-world setting
interventionNames: Device: Lehfilcon A spherical contact lenses

armGroups.label: TOTAL30 for Astigmatism
armGroups.description: Lehfilcon A toric contact lenses worn in both eyes in a real-world setting
interventionNames: Device: Lehfilcon A toric contact lenses

interventions.name: Lehfilcon A spherical contact lenses
interventions.description: Silicone hydrogel contact lenses for the correction of ametropia (myopia or hyperopia)

interventions.name: Lehfilcon A toric contact lenses
interventions.description: Silicone hydrogel contact lenses for the correction of ametropia (myopia or hyperopia) with astigmatism

primaryOutcomes.measure: Distance visual acuity with study lenses at baseline
primaryOutcomes.description: Visual acuity (VA) assessed per the investigator's standard of care with study lenses in place.

primaryOutcomes.measure: Distance visual acuity with study lenses at 1-year follow-up
primaryOutcomes.description: Visual acuity (VA) assessed per the investigator's standard of care with study lenses in place.
Incidence of corneal infiltrative events occurring after the Baseline Visit will be determined retrospectively (chart review) and prospectively (eye exam).
Incidence of microbial keratitis occurring after the Baseline Visit will be determined retrospectively (chart review) and prospectively (eye exam).

eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: Subjects will be recruited from clinical sites located in the United States.

locations.facility: Contact Alcon Call Center for Trial Locations
